text_block_list.text: One day, rain was practically pouring from the skies.

I figured it wouldn't bother us, as our plans for the day 
happened to keep us inside for strength training. I had 
not factored in T.M. Opera O ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, how ravishing, this rain-soaked appearance of mine……
choice_data_list: Why in heavens are you dripping wet!?
Why in heavens are you dripping wet!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The skies were crying out to behold my radiance, you see. 
It is another duty of a king to see them soothed.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, the moment I stepped outside, yours truly 
and the rain formed an ensemble — one which played 
a performance most captivating.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Sweeping over the track beside the raging winds, my glorious 
visage sparkling with drops of rain… true perfection!!
choice_data_list: You went running in this downpour!?
You went running in this downpour!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Why, most certainly!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
On a soft, drenched track such as today's, every single one 
of my steps is powerful and striking.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Should my performance be desired, I will take 
to the stage no matter the circumstance.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! It goes without saying.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My ambitions lie in becoming The Era's High King! 
An unsurpassed brilliance shining its light upon the world!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Be it driving rains or suffocating snow, none can 
be considered so much as an obstacle!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
On the contrary, should the whims of the skies 
be able to influence me so, the title of high king 
would remain far out of reach.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
…… Oh now, what is this, my dear trainer? You gaze upon me 
as if entranced… have you perchance fallen for my charms?
choice_data_list: I was thinking… you're so passionate.
I was thinking… you're so passionate.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh, don't tell me you only realized now?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, you do good to notice. 
Let me hear all the praise you hold in your heart for me!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: For indeed, words of praise exist to be used on me!! Now let me hear them! My dea-ar t-trai-chooo!

A small lake was starting to form where T.M. Opera O stood. 
She's gonna catch a cold in this state.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm? These garments do me quite fine…… Ahh! Trainer, don't tell me……

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Has the rain-enhanced luster of my hair 
inspired feelings of bashfulness in you?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But of course! I fully understand your feelings! 
My striking beauty must have set your heart aflutter!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer, dear?!

I managed to manoeuvre a reluctant 
T.M. Opera O out of the room somehow.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Dear me, why would you kick me out like that… 
Is this really what you desire?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: To forgo a chance at beholding my glistening glamour?
choice_data_list: I don't want you coming down with a cold.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, you needn't worry yourself with such 
unreasonable futures. There is only one future 
you need to believe in.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That being the one where yours truly dons 
the crown of The Era's High King to engulf 
the world in my radiant light.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In any case, let us confront the day's training. 
It would after all be inconceivable for yours truly 
to neglect routine and discipline.
choice_data_list: Your jersey is still soaked though……

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
So it is, which is why I will run in my uniform! 
At the riverbank, perhaps? Perfectly encapsulating 
the wonders of youth!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yours truly running through the rain, powerful stride 
contrasted by a fluttering skirt. Ah… how magnificent!!

I had to try everything in my power to prevent T.M. Opera O 
from dashing back outside in her uniform.
